hovertext: Hugo Swire
Income Categories
Employment

From 9 November 2016, Adviser to KIS France, a manufacturer of photo booths and mini labs. Address: 7 Rue Jean Pierre Timbaud, 38130 Echirolles, France. I expect to be paid £3,000 every month until further notice. Hours: 8 hrs per month. I consulted A
Co
BA about this appointment. (Registered 16 November 2016)

From 15 November 2016, Deputy Chairman of the Commonwealth Enterprise and Investment Council. Address: Marlborough House, Pall Mall, London SW1
Y 5
HX. I expect to be paid £2,000 every month until further notice. Hours: 10 hrs per month. I consulted A
Co
BA about this appointment. (Registered 16 November 2016)
